Package siminov.core.database

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Clause
    It is used to create where clause used in database query.
    Database
    Exposes methods to interact with database.
    DatabaseBundle
    It is a collection of below database items: 1.
    DatabaseFactory
    Exposes methods to create database instance based on Database Type needed.
    DatabaseHelper
    It provides utility methods to deal with database.
    DatabaseUtils
    Exposes utils methods to deal with database.
    Where
    It is used to provide condition between where clause.
